Package at.htlkaindorf.entities.collectables

Class Collectable

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
at.htlkaindorf.entities.collectables.Collectable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Coin
public abstract class Collectable
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
The collectable class is the parent class of all collectables. It extends the sprite class.
